services2.title: Five Essential Services. One Complete System.
services2.text: Everything Thai massage businesses need to compete online—professionally built, fully managed, always working together. Here's what you get:

items.title: Professional Website
items.text: Beautiful, fast-loading website built for Thai massage businesses. Mobile-friendly, Google-optimised, and designed to convert visitors into bookings. Everything handled for you.

items.title: AI Receptionist
items.text: Answers every call and message instantly—even when you're hands-on with clients. Available 24/7 with professional communication. Every enquiry gets a response.

items.title: Online Booking System
items.text: Clients book themselves anytime, day or night. Your calendar fills automatically, confirmations send instantly, and double-bookings become impossible. Simple.

items.title: Gift Voucher Management
items.text: Customers buy gift vouchers online anytime. The system handles payments, delivery, and tracking automatically. Get paid upfront, zero admin.

items.title: Review Automation
items.text: Turn satisfied clients into Google reviews automatically. AI handles requests, responses, and Facebook sharing—building your reputation while you focus on treatments.

services2.bottomText: We build everything for you, train your team to use it, and provide ongoing support in Thai and English. Updates, changes, improvements—all handled forever. You never touch the technical side.

whoWeAre.header: We're on a mission to give Thai massage businesses the online presence they deserve—without expensive agencies or confusing software. Professional systems that work, fully managed, at prices that make sense.
whoWeAre.title: Built By People Who Understand You
whoWeAre.text: I'm Kris, originally from Thailand and now living in the UK. I've seen brilliant Thai therapists remain invisible online or waste money on marketing that doesn't work. Too many get trapped between DIY tools they can't manage and expensive agencies that don't deliver.
whoWeAre.text2: That's why I built ThaiSpaPro with Andrew, my partner. We handle your complete online presence—websites, booking, AI receptionist, reviews, gift vouchers—so you can focus entirely on what you do best.
